## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the [CODING_STANDARDS.md](docs/development/CODING_STANDARDS.md)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My code has type hints for all functions
- [ ] I have added docstrings to all public functions/classes

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Test coverage is >= 80% for new code
- [ ] I have tested edge cases

### Documentation
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added/updated docstrings

### Git
- [ ] My commits follow the [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) format
- [ ] My branch is up to date with the main branch
- [ ] I have rebased my branch on main (if needed)

### CI/CD
- [ ] All CI/CD checks pass
- [ ] No new linter warnings
- [ ] Type checking (mypy) passes
- [ ] Code formatting (Black) passes
